name: Visual Design System - Shadow Tokens
description: Subtle, professional shadow definitions for depth without distraction
usage_note: Shadows should be used sparingly in scientific figures. Nature and JACC figures typically avoid shadows. Use only for infographics and social media content.

publication_guidelines.scientific_figures: No shadows - maintain flat, clean appearance
publication_guidelines.infographics: xs to md shadows acceptable for visual hierarchy
publication_guidelines.social_media: sm to lg shadows for engagement, depth
publication_guidelines.print: Avoid - shadows don't reproduce well in print
